summary: Avinash comes to a city where everyone wants to kill him.
cast: Anil Kapoor|Rani Mukerji|Manisha Koirala|Satish Kaushik|Sayaji Shinde|Saurabh Shukla|Deven Verma|Ganesh Yadav|Shivaaji Satam|Tarun Shukla|Tara Mehta|Ashraf Ul Haq|Abdul Qayyoom Khan|Akhil Mishra|Harish Patel|Rajendra Sethi|Gopal Singh|Neeraj Sood|Tiku Talsania
title: Calcutta Mail
